named-query.name: BC_READ_DEFAULT_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_BY_ORDER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE fg.order.id = :orderId AND fg.primary = TRUE

named-query.name: BC_READ_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_BY_STATUS_ASC
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE fg.status = :status ORDER BY fg.order.auditable.dateCreated ASC

named-query.name: BC_READ_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_BY_STATUS_DESC
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE fg.status = :status ORDER BY fg.order.auditable.dateCreated DESC

named-query.name: BC_READ_UNFULFILLED_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ASC
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE (fg.status <> 'FULFILLED' AND fg.status <> 'DELIVERED') ORDER BY fg.order.auditable.dateCreated ASC

named-query.name: BC_READ_PARTIALLY_FULFILLED_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ASC
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE (fg.status = 'PARTIALLY_FULFILLED' OR fg.status = 'PARTIALLY_DELIVERED') ORDER BY fg.order.auditable.dateCreated ASC

named-query.name: BC_READ_UNPROCESSED_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_ASC
named-query.query: SELECT fg FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE (fg.status IS NULL) ORDER BY fg.order.auditable.dateCreated ASC

named-query.name: BC_READ_MAX_FULFILLMENT_GROUP_SEQUENCE
named-query.query: SELECT MAX(fg.sequence) FROM org.broadleafcommerce.core.order.domain.FulfillmentGroup fg WHERE fg.order.id = :orderId
